channel.title: Ppl get kicked off after a while and cant get back on... please help!
channel.description:
[glow=blue,2,300]PLEASE HELP!!!![/glow]
Well at first everyone can log on normally but then after a while tehy get kicked off and cant go back on or they could never go on in the first place.. when i rerun the client it works normally and tehn starts all over again.... can someoen please help!!!!!
btw it says "Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space" when like the 4th person logs on.. how do i fix this.. i tried deleting some saved games and it still happens.

item.title: Ppl get kicked off after a while and cant get back on... please help!
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

Another reason may be:
If your using testscape source and you just click compile and leave that running then try and log in on that it will boot people off more and not allow as much people online.
Use the Runserver.bat when running the server and run compile while the server is running then just send the update thing and when it hits 0 reload the server from Runserver.bat

Works for me

Read full topic
item.source: Ppl get kicked off after a while and cant get back on... please help!

item.title: Ppl get kicked off after a while and cant get back on... please help!
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

ok ok i had th tproblem back in the day lol ill tell yu wht to do[br][size=1]Posted at: September 27, 2006, 05:57:07 PM[/size][hr]JAVA -Xmx500m server add tht inbetween "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx500m server "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_06injava.exe" server so it looks like this
